mutants.code:
import re

def match_quote(text):
    text = re.sub("[^\\w\\s']", ' ', text)
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    pattern = re.compile("you can\\'t judge a book by its cover", re.IGNORECASE)
    match = pattern.search(text)
    return match is None

import re

def match_quote(text):
    text = re.sub('', ' ', text)
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    pattern = re.compile("you can\\'t judge a book by its cover", re.IGNORECASE)
    match = pattern.search(text)
    return match is not None

    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    pattern = re.compile("you can\\'t judge a book by its cover", re.IGNORECASE)
    match = pattern.search(text)
    return match is not None

import re

    text = re.sub('\\s+', '', text)
    pattern = re.compile("you can\\'t judge a book by its cover", re.IGNORECASE)

mutants.code:
import re

def match_quote(text):
    text = re.sub("[^\\w\\s']", ' ', text)
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    pattern = re.compile('', re.IGNORECASE)
    match = pattern.search(text)
    return match is not None
